alert.note: Alert for Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:19PM MDT until May 27 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perkins County in northwestern South Dakota... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 519 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Hettinger to 6 miles northeast of Date, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bison around 530 PM MDT. White Butte and Owen Lake around 535 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Chance, Lemmon and Meadow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
